title: Episode 59: Daniel LaPlante
description:
Knocking inside the walls, strange writings in blood, and a costumed figure in the dark. Was it a spirit haunting this house? Or something more terrifying? One family's greatest fear turned into another family's living nightmare. All at the hands of a young monster.
